Famous legend of Parijat: Princess Parijat was said to be a very beautiful yet sensitive who fell in love with Lord Surya, as he rode his fiery chariot from the east to the west in the sky. Her father and others had warned her that loving a divine being is not advisable for +

Maa Parvati often was lonely as Lord Shiva frequently went out of Kailash Parvat to fight demons, and so she asked for a daughter from the Kalpavriksha. As her wish was granted, Ashoka Sundari was born: referenced briefly in Padma Puran. ++
